numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I notice that the highest percentage of people who reach out to a parent is less than 75%.
2. Young women who use text messages have the highest percentage.
4. I think that this percentage is lower than many people hope.
5. I notice that the smallest gender gap appears for visiting in person.
6. I suppose that visiting in person depends less on gender than on location.
7. I wonder how people find time to visit in person at least a few times a week.
8. Even if a person lives relatively close to the parents, it can be hard to find time to visit in person.
9. If a person lives very close to the parents, I wonder why the person does not live with the parents.
10. I am a young college student.
11. I live a few hours of driving away from home.
12. I am more likely to text my parents than to call my parents.
13. I often call my parents about once a week.
14. A possible name of this graph is "Young Women More Likely to Call Mom than Men".
15. A possible name of this graph is "Most Kids Prefer Texting their Parents, Not Calling".
